summary: Diff appears to implement manual typing/editing for the Visit Date field in the visit entry form and expands Medicine Name to a multi-line input, with corresponding updates implied for multi-line display in the entries list. There are also modifications to global styling and query hooks that are not explicitly requested by REQ-6/REQ-7.

hallucinated_features.description: Global theme/style changes (calm clinical color palette) beyond the requested Visit Date and Medicine Name UX adjustments.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest scope is limited to adjusting Visit Date and Medicine Name input UX (no other new UI/theme work requested). The diff summary indicates index.css was modified to change the global palette.

hallucinated_features.description: Changes to React Query hooks/backend operation helpers not directly tied to REQ-6/REQ-7.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-6/REQ-7 are frontend UX changes in the form/list; modifying the general query hooks is not requested in the BuildRequest, and the diff summary indicates useQueries.ts was modified.
